prompt: Medium shot, low angle for drama: A People Ops Manager (Black woman, late 30s) stands on a windy, sun-drenched urban rooftop terrace. She wears a sharp blazer in the primary brand indigo (#2563eb). A sudden gust of wind has sent a stack of onboarding papers flying from her hands—she reaches out to catch them in a dynamic, frozen-action pose, her expression a mix of shock and amused laughter at the chaos. In the foreground, large lush emerald green potted palms frame the shot. The flying papers visually represent the struggle of keeping a distributed team connected. Warm golden sunlight creates high contrast. Vibrant Kodak Ektar 100 colors with punchy saturation, shot on Hasselblad X2D 100C, 85mm lens, f/2.8, natural skin texture, golden hour warmth, editorial photography for Vogue Business
